Time

Summary
Time
Functions
time_in_timezoneReturns the appropriate time() for representing a timezone.
timezonesReturns an array of timezones that have unique offsets.
set_timezoneSets the timezone.
get_timezone()Returns the current timezone.
relative_timeReturns the difference between the given timestamps or now.
nowAlias to strtotime, for prettiness like now(“+1 day”).

Functions

time_in_timezone

function time_in_timezone($timezone)

Returns the appropriate time() for representing a timezone.

Returns

The appropriate time() for representing a timezone.

timezones

function timezones()

Returns an array of timezones that have unique offsets.  Doesn’t count deprecated timezones.  Returns: $zones - Array of timezones that have unique offsets.  Doesn’t count deprecated timezones.

set_timezone

function set_timezone($timezone)

Sets the timezone.

Parameters

$timezoneThe timezone to set.

get_timezone()

function get_timezone()

Returns the current timezone.

Returns

Time Zone

relative_time

function relative_time($when,  
$from =  null)

Returns the difference between the given timestamps or now.

Parameters

$timeTimestamp to compare to.
$fromTimestamp to compare from.  If not specified, defaults to now.

Returns

A string formatted like “3 days ago” or “3 days from now”.

now

function now($when)

Alias to strtotime, for prettiness like now(“+1 day”).
